authCheckEmailExists: SELECT email FROM usuarios WHERE email = $1
authGetEmpresaByName: SELECT id FROM empresas WHERE nombre_empresa = $1
authInsertEmpresa: INSERT INTO empresas (nombre_empresa) VALUES ($1) RETURNING id
authCheckRolExists: SELECT id FROM roles WHERE id = $1
authInsertUsuario: INSERT INTO usuarios (email, password_hash, rol_id, empresa_id, correo_verificado, token_verificacion, expiracion_token_verificacion) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7) RETURNING id
authInsertPerfil: INSERT INTO perfiles (usuario_id, nombre, apellido) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
authGetUserByVerificationToken: SELECT id, email, correo_verificado, expiracion_token_verificacion FROM usuarios WHERE token_verificacion = $1
authVerifyUserEmail: UPDATE usuarios SET correo_verificado = TRUE, token_verificacion = NULL, expiracion_token_verificacion = NULL WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id, email, correo_verificado
authGetUserByEmail: SELECT u.id, u.password_hash, u.correo_verificado, p.nombre, r.nombre_rol, r.id AS rol_id FROM usuarios u JOIN perfiles p ON u.id = p.usuario_id JOIN roles r ON u.rol_id = r.id WHERE u.email = $1
authGetUserForRecovery: SELECT id, email, correo_verificado FROM usuarios WHERE email = $1
authUpdateResetToken: UPDATE usuarios SET token_reset_password = $1, expiracion_token_reset = $2 WHERE id = $3
authGetUserByResetToken: SELECT id, expiracion_token_reset FROM usuarios WHERE token_reset_password = $1
authResetPassword: UPDATE usuarios SET password_hash = $1, token_reset_password = NULL, expiracion_token_reset = NULL WHERE id = $2
authGetUserById: SELECT u.id, p.nombre, u.email, r.nombre_rol, r.id AS rol_id FROM usuarios u JOIN perfiles p ON u.id = p.usuario_id JOIN roles r ON u.rol_id = r.id WHERE u.id = $1
